rexamsll 0.3.2.0

    google-sheets installation spreadsheet-validation

Function reference

All functions

add_from_pool()
Add a question to a dataframe from a pool of answers.
add_question()
Add a question to a dataframe, validating and/or transforming inputs.
add_string_question()
Add a string-type question to a dataframe compatible with schoice, etc.
build_choices()
Choose correct and incorrect answers and format them for r/exams files.
build_question_df()
Build a question dataframe, with question, image, correct, incorrect, and explanation columns.
bulleted_list()
Concatenate string items to form a bulleted list.
comment_out_sections_()
Help remove all sections from a pre-created QTI zip file.
create_id()
create an ID with format "[category][subcat][random number]"
csv2rmd()
Convert a csv file of questions into r/exams-style Rmd files.
df2rmd()
Convert a dataframe of questions into r/exams-style Rmd files.
drop_sections()
Remove all sections from a pre-created QTI zip file.
dyna_question_segment_()
Generate a single add_from_pool call for this row
dyna_string_question_segment_()
Generate a single add_string_question call for this row
end_logs()
Wrapper for logr::log_close()
exams2js()
Create a simple Javascript-powered quiz for testing purposes.
find_answer_columns()
Find all answer columns in a dataframe.
find_questions()
Locate all exercise files that match the metadata filters.
get_metadata()
Retrieve all r/exams-specific metadata from a question's .Rmd file.
google2rmd()
Download a Google Sheet of questions and convert it to Rmd files.
img2txt()
Convert an image into a very rough text representation.
reformat_string_()
Fix strings for use in dynamic R code chunks
start_logs()
Create a log file, if needed, and run logr::log_open
validate_df()
Ensure that a dataframe conforms to rexamsll standards, stopping otherwise.
xlsx2rmd()
Convert an xlsx spreadsheet of questions into r/exams-style Rmd files.

Developed by Brighton Pauli.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
